survey.question: How much did you enjoy the task?
How difficult was it to communicate with your partner?
How successful do you think you were at completing the task?
How difficult was it to understand your partner's instructions?
How likely is your partner to be a fluent speaker of English?
How likely is your partner to be a fluent speaker of Spanish?
How likely do you think it is that your partner is bilingual?
Please rate your partner according to the following attributes: friendly
Please rate your partner according to the following attributes: smart
Please rate your partner according to the following attributes: collaborative
Please rate your partner according to the following attributes: honest

How likely do you think it was that you were talking to a chatbot rather than a human?
If you were communicating with a chat bot, would you want them to communicate in both English and Spanish?

chat.msg: hola, q tal? ready to play?
Start off at the map image
hey there! i'm at the start now
there's a twig to my left that seems to lead to a small island with a tiger on it. what's next?
That's right! Next, go to the island to the left of the tiger and find the parrot.
ah, got ya
i'm at the big island with the parrot now, what's the next move?
Go south and find the rocks that you can cross.
okie dokie
did you find the frog?
got it! found the little froggy
where to now?
Go to the left of the island and then walk over the alligator.
sure thing! i've just crossed over the crocodile
Continue to go left and cross the rocks to the next island, which has a giraffe on it.
on it! moved past the crocodile and sprinkled some water on the elephant as i passed by
now i'm standing alongside the giraffe- what's next?
Ok, great. Go south and cross the water to the next island. Watch out for the snake!
thanks for the heads up, almost didn't see the slippery fellow there! now, where should i move?
If you go to the right, you will find the TREASURE!!!
yaaay! got the treasure, amigo
thanks for guiding, this was fun. *finished*

chat.msg: hola, q tal? empezamos el juego?
Hi there! Where should I start?
hi, mate! awesome, you're right where we want to be - by the white dog. now, head west just under that wooden bench and cross the trail until you get near the florist stand
but don't go there yet! turn around back towards the dog instead.
Ok, I'm going towards the dog.
fab! once you get to the dog, head south
you'll cross over a branch and keep going down the map. you'll spot another white dog, this one's chilling next to a checkered picnic blanket
Found him! What's next?
great job! now, pass over the picnic blanket, get to the berries and keep going until you hit the west
Do you mean the berries at the fruit stand?
yep, those are the ones! after that, spot the wooden branch and cross the river heading north
I'm lost, sorry.
not to worry, we've all been there. from the berry bowl, head straight west until you spot a wooden branch
once you see it, cross the river and go north. you'll see a green bush
Ok, thanks. I'm at the green bush.
rollin' in the right way
circle it from the right side and continue until you reach the florist stand
I'm there.
sweet! now head west, go under the stand, and you're gonna pass a big bridge
check out the couple riding a bicycle there
Yes, I see the couple!
neat, isn't it? now keep going west past the bridge
you'll spot two elderly people on a bench enjoying the newspapers
Yup, see them.
great! now go a few steps south between them and a wooden branch
OK
excellent! keep going until you reach a bush next to the end of the branch
Got it!
awesome! now go east, just between the branch and the bush
The branch that goes over the water?
thats right! keep going east and you'll spot a young brown deer
say hello from me!
Hello deer!!
excellent! you've completed the path
well done, virtual high-five!
We did it!!!!!!
heck yeah, we sure did! you did an awesome job navigating!
Great job giving directions!
thanks, mate! you were sensational in following them! let's play again sometime!
Sure thing!
cool, looking forward to it! catch you later!
OK, bye!
bye for now, take care!
I have to go now. bye!
bye! have a great day!
You too.
thank you! bye bye!

chat.msg: hola!!! ya comenzamos?
Hello! Are you at the tent now?
hey! yep, i'm at the tent, facing south
i see a fire with a dog to the left and a red mushroom to the right. what's the move?
First, go south, and say hi to the dog. Then go east, but watch out for the fire. Then go south once you see the mushrooms.
cool, walked past the dog and fire, now by the red mushroom
heading south now, yes?
Yes, head south. When you reach the blue car, turn around and then go south.
gotcha! now i'm by the blue car, turning around and going south again
Pass the telescope.
walked past the telescope, so, which way now?
When you get to the path again, go west.
alright, going west
i see some rocks and a wooden house. am i done?
Yes, when you reach the house, you are done! Mission complete!
awesome, reached the house! *finished* thanks for guiding me!

chat.msg: hi there! que comience el juego!!
Hi! Where should I go first?
hey! ready to roll? start by heading under that first palm tree to your south-west, swing a quick right to cross the second palm tree, and then make a sharp left before hitting the third tree
straight south from there!
OK, got it!
perfect! next, spot that cute brown puppy on your left, swing it slightly towards your left then right, continuing south
it's like dancing, isn't it?
Yes, kind of like dancing Hi puppy!
haha, you're doing great! now, let's weave between those two rocks up ahead - the big one on your left and the small one on your right
then, straight ahead to our cute little ocean view. enjoying the adventure?
Beautiful ocean!
i know right! now for a bit of fun, let's take a step into the water and say hello to the big red crab
after that, turn right and keep on going west, right next to that big rock we saw earlier. it's like we're on a beach adventure!
Hello Mr. Crab!
haha, hope mr
crab is friendly today! keep going along the water until you see a medium sized rock. once you're there, you'll need to make a sharp right turn just as you spot a shark
Oh, no! Not a shark!!!!!!
hey, don't worry! you're playing safe, just take that sharp turn, head back to the land, and squeeze between that medium rock and the colourful ball
keep going north. almost like we're running away from the shark, right?
Wow, that was close. I'm safe and sound on land again.
whew! good going, my pal! from here, nudge just a bit to the left and walk towards the north-west till you spot a red tent and a big speaker
take the path in between those two
Ok
nice one! next, see if you can find a way to circle around the tent in a nice arc, and then head straight down south
it's like we're doing a dance around the tent!
Yup, dancing at the tent now!
excellent moves! continue your dance southwards, but before you reach the water, quickly swing to your right
there's a red kayak you need to go under
Crawling under the kayak right now ...
great! pop back up, turn 90 degrees to your right, and walk along the length of the kayak
up ahead, you'll spot a small green bush. congratulations, my friend - you made it to the end of this round!
Yeah! You were a great partner!
you rocked it, my friend! couldn't have done it without you
ready for the next round?
Yup, ready to go!
awesome! let's start a new adventure then!
Looks like our time isn't up yet. We went too fast!
ha! we're too good at this
looks like we're getting pro level! ready to take it from the top or try a new adventure?
Let's try a new adventure!
perfect! new adventure it is
let's get to it!
One more minute to go ...
great! let's make it count! remember every adventure begins with a single step
ready to take yours?
Totally ready.
awesome! let's go and conquer the world together! let's start by taking an imaginary hike up that nearby mountain on your left
ok.
fantastic, my friend! congratulations on another successful game session, can't wait till our next adventure
See you soon!
can't wait! see you on our next adventure, be safe!
You as well.
thank you! see you next time for more fun
bye for now!
